cleaner module¶

Checks raw data read from file to ensure smooth analysis.

cleaner.cleanClipper(data, endTime)¶

Clips times and voltages to reflect user-specified end time

Parameters:
  • data – numpy array of raw data
  • endTime – user-specified end time in minutes
Returns:

numpy array of appropriately windowed data
cleaner.cleanFloat(something)¶

Investigates things for possible casting to float and does so if possible.

cleaner.cleanInterpolate(rawData, which)¶

Replaces ‘interpolate’ with appropriately interpolated value.

Parameters:
  • rawData – incoming list of lists of times and voltages
  • which – integer designation of which list to clean
Returns:

list of lists of times and voltages, cleaner than before
cleaner.cleanTime(something)¶

Ensures time that will be appended to list is appopriate.

cleaner.cleanVoltage(something)¶

Ensures voltage that will be appended to list is appropriate.

Heart Rate Monitor
